About

Hey there! This page was included as an example. After I downloaded the example I changed the text!

There are currently two themes built on Poole:

  • Hyde
  • Lanyon

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

Setup

Some fun facts about the setup of this project include:

  • Built for Jekyll
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages
  • Coded with Sublime Text 2, an amazing code editor
  • Designed and developed while listening to music like Blood Bros Trilogy

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter.

Thanks for reading!

Show me your stack

  • Built on top of the beautiful work by @mdo and the Hyde theme for Poole, the butler for Jekyll. If you are so inlined, you should totally check these things out.
  • I do my "wireframes" on whatever paper is around, lately thats Rhodia Dot Pads using blue ball point pens and Black Wing Pencils
  • akjkajladkljfla
  • My monospace masticator of choice is Sublime Text 2
